name: More Than Tank!
description:
<< Use fullscreen button in lower right! >>

 by David Luo and Jason Liu

More than TANK!

“More than TANK!” is a two player strategic pixel 2D tank game. The player can destroy each other or build the blocks to defend; the goal of the game is to destroy the opponent tank. 

Player 1:

Moving Forward: W

Rotate Clockwise: D

Rotate Anticlockwise: A

Shoot: J

Select Building Space: K

Build: K+L

Player 2:

Moving Forward: Up

Rotate Clockwise: Right

Rotate Anticlockwise: Left

Shoot: 1

Select Building Space: 2

Build: 2+3
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
